videoSnippet.title: Showing Who's Boss Yet Again! || Carlsen vs Nepo || GCT Croatia (2022)
videoSnippet.description:
Photo by Lennart Ootes!
Magnus Will Not Defend Title https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Spq1Kecueyg 
Watch entire Bobby Fischer saga here! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0A8-8M8fb04&list=PLDnx7w_xuguENa5LgFG7Gi8aYRVVnXxFE

Have a great day :)

Carlsen, Magnus (2864) - Nepomniachtchi, Ian (2766) 
SuperUnited Rapid & Blitz Croatia (chess24.com) [24] 2022.07.24
B23 Sicilian, closed

1.e4 c5 2.Nc3 d6 3.d4 cxd4 4.Qxd4 Nc6 5.Qd2 g6 6.b3 f5 7.Bb2 Bg7 8.O-O-O Qa5 9.Nd5 Qxd2+ 10.Rxd2 Bxb2+ 11.Kxb2 Kf7 12.exf5 Bxf5 13.Bc4 Ne5 14.Be2 Nf6 15.Nxf6 Kxf6 16.f4 Nd7 17.Bf3 Nc5 18.Ne2 Be4 19.Bxe4 Nxe4 20.Rd4 Nc5 21.Nc3 Kf7 22.Re1 Rhe8 23.Nd5 Rac8 24.c4 h6 25.Re3 a6 26.Rh3 Kg7 27.Re3 Kf7 28.g4 Nd7 29.f5 Ne5 30.a4 gxf5 31.gxf5 Rg8 32.Rh4 b5 33.cxb5 axb5 34.axb5 Rc5 35.Nc3 Rg2+ 36.Ka3 Rc8 37.Rxh6 Ra8+ 38.Na4 Rg4 39.Rc3 Ra5 40.b6 Rb5 41.Rc7 Rgb4 42.Rh3 Kf6 43.Rhc3 Rh4 44.h3 Rf4 45.Re3 Rf1 46.Nc3 Ra5+ 47.Kb4 Ra6 48.Nd5+ Kxf5 49.b7 Rc6 50.b8=Q

00:00 Hello Everyone!
02:00 The Nice Photo!
02:28 Game Starts!
03:15 Completely New Game!
10:00 Pause the Video!
12:35 Pause the Video! 2
13:45 It Was In This Position
14:30 Standings! 
15:50 Contributions

The SuperUnited Rapid & Blitz Croatia is the 3rd stage on the 2022 Grand Chess Tour, a series of five events with a total prize fund of $1.4 million. The 10-player event is taking place in the Westin Hotel in Zagreb from July 20-24, 2022.

The rapid is a 10-player single round-robin with 3 rounds each day on the first 3 days at a time control of 25 minutes for all moves and a 10-second increment from move 1. The final 2 days are a blitz double round-robin, with 18 rounds of 5+2 blitz. Rapid games count double, with 2 points for a win and 1 for a draw. Official website: grandchesstour.org
